trans-unit.source: Associates a well-known object type that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator with a remote endpoint that can process messages that are sent to a method on the type.

The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType> class is used to hold information that is specified on the command line to the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5) through the `-types` argument.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType"></xref> class with the object <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
The object <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that is passed to the WSDL generator.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType"></xref> class with the URL and <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of an object that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
The object <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that is passed to the WSDL generator.
The well-known endpoint that can process messages that are sent to a method on the object type that is specified in the type parameter.
Gets the object <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
The object <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType"></xref> was created for.
Gets the URL of an object <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
The URL of an object <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType"></xref> was created for.
